archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Customer Problem Diagnostics
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Determine the source (root cause) of the problem � Utilize service performance and service problem management functions � Use Diagnostics /Testing tools to determine the actual cause � Use a detailed physical, logical and service inventory to create a up-to-date detailed customer connectivity/topology view. � Receive service quality of service violation data from Service Quality Management � Correlate various events associated with customer contact to determine the source � Update the case with a �Cause Code�
